name: Dolores To Donuts
description:
Dolores wants to be a model employee at the donut shop, but punching holes in donuts all day? BORING! Luckily, her coworker Trini has introduced her to a new mobile game that should help her kill the monotony. However, she has to be careful, because every 10 seconds, the foreman performs his inspection, and if she is caught screwing off, she'll be in trouble! Can you help Dolores juggle the challenge of being a responsible adult, while still getting a high score in her game? Find out in "Dolores to Donuts"

Controls:

Mouse - Clicking the phone screen will swap Dolores' concentration between the phone screen and her job. 

Clicking the Donut press will punch holes in donuts.

WSAD - Move around in the mobile game.

Hints: Timing is key. Try to aim for the center of each donut. And remember not to punch holes in cream and jelly-filled ones! Look for the telltale filling on the side of the donut!

No Grapes Games is:

Art: Justin Raimey

Programming: Nathan Caldwell

Story: Andrew Caldwell
